COMPONENT NAME: IKM Oracle Load COMPONENT VERSION: 12.1.2.0.0 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: ODI 12.1.2.0.0 or above
DESCRIPTION:
Oracle datastore DML.
Oracle extraction hint for querying source tables
Disable/enable constraints before/after the data is loaded into target table
None, Disable, Enable, Disable and Enable
Select the appropriate value to disable/enable constraints before/after the data is loaded into target table
Disable/enable indexes before/after the data is loaded into target table
None, Disable, Enable, Enable Rebuild Online, Disable and Enable, Disable and Enable Rebuild Online
Select the appropriate value to disable/enable indexes before/after the data is loaded into target table
